async_info.video_title: Egypt protests: The unlikely man behind rare anti-government protests - BBC News
async_info.video_description:
He‚Äôs the unlikely man behind Egypt‚Äôs rare anti-government protests.
Viral videos by Mohamed Ali, a businessman turned actor turned whistle-blower, have spurred hundreds onto the streets.
He spoke to BBC Arabic about why he has accused President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi of corruption.
Please subscribe HERE http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

comment_content.original_script:
The gradually sinking world economy produces hardships which are turned into protests with rioting and destruction. The Hong Kong protests have created recession, now manifest. The protests themselves create the worsening financial situation that caused them in the first place. This disaster is self-perpetuating. The appearance of WRATH Revelation 11: 18 and financial meltdown Psalms 46: 4-6 is a hand- in- hand disaster now manifest. In Q4 of 2019; 24 violent protests and riots on a large scale have been published.
The 'kings of north near and far', Syria and Russia, strut their stuff in the build up to world wide wrath. Jeremiah 25: 24-26 Revelation 11: 18. WE stand at the beginning of an extinction level event, seen in protests and riots in 24 places in Q4 of 2019. Daniel 2: 31-46. 'They will not be sticking together'.... the [clay-like] ordinary people; and the 'iron-like' totalitarian political forces [The police and military] so that violent protests and riots appear. The 24 places of violent protests in the face of a sinking world economy are:
Spain, Sudan, Russia, Egypt, Uganda, Indonesia, Ukraine, Peru, Hong Kong, Zimbabwe, Colombia, France, Turkey, Venezuela, The Netherlands, Ethiopia, Brazil, Malawi, Algeria, Iraq, Haiti, Ecuador, Lebanon, and Chile.
We are at the beginning of an extinction event based on WRATH. Revelation 11: 18: "The nations became wrathful, and your [God's] own wrath came, and the time came....to bring to ruin those ruining the earth."
"And they try to heal the breakdown of my people lightly, saying: "There is peace! There is peace!" when there is no peace."Jeremiah 6: 14.
The enriched uranium nuclear assets of Iran will be BOMBED, and the pilots will refuel in Saudi Arabia. The anger and reprisal of Iran is seen in Daniel 11: 44, 45. This is the BOMBING of Israel; the 'desolations' Matthew 24: 15 that introduce the 'Great tribulation' Matthew 24: 21, 22. At this time, Israel is declaring: "Peace and security!" due to the implementation of initiatives orchestrated by the White House administration. 1Thessalonians 5: 2, 3. This 'sudden destruction', spreading into a worldwide cataclysm, is the visible 'False prophecy' of "Peace and security!" by the False prophet indicated in Revelation 19: 20. The disaster appearing is SATAN; Gog of Magog; Revelation 20: 1-10 coming upon 'the soil of Israel'. Ezekiel 38: 18, 19. So the time has come for Jehovah to SPEAK. Jehovah changes the worldwide government, when the political system is ejected from authority at a time of 'hissing missiles' 2Peter 3: 10; and Christ Jesus arrives 'in power and great glory'. Matthew 24: 21, 22, 29, 30. This arrival is also indicated in Matthew 25: 31, and in verse 34 the 'sheep-like' true Christians John 3: 16 are already inside God's Kingdom at the time of His arrival. THAT is why they are also described as survivors Revelation 7: 9, 14-17. This Kingdom also outlined in Daniel 2: 44; the Paradise Christ described in Luke 23: 43 will be created from the earth after the five month crisis of the Great tribulation is over. This cataclysm is brought to an end by Divine interventions when the wicked are destroyed Psalms 92: 7 Psalms 37: 8-10. This history has been written as prophecy, so that we can have confidence in the true God, and understand what He is doing to save us from the cataclysm of the Great tribulation. This good news has been preached worldwide Romans 10: 13-15 Matthew 24: 14 to greatly increase the numbers being saved due to understanding and faith. The political system, engages in wickedness so that it resembles a 'wild beast' Revelation 13: 11-13. Prophecy shows the political system are all executed Revelation 19: 11, 19-21 and Christ Jesus Revelation 11: 15, 18 and His heavenly brothers Revelation 5: 10 Rule over faithful mankind in place of them. The time comes for the dead to be raised up in an orderly manner; Revelation 20: 13 Acts 24: 15 because Christ Jesus has died in their places. Romans 5: 12; Romans 6: 23. The end result is a 'New Heavens' Ruling over a "New Earth'; a Paradise Revelation 21: 1. Luke 23: 43. This massive change in the structure of human society is on our doorstep. "The nations became wrathful and your [God's] own wrath came, and the time came....to bring to ruin those ruining the earth." Revelation 11: 18.
We stand at the beginning of an extinction level event based on WRATH; and the true God has promised to act.

comment_content.original_script:
@lyxnafis
I'm afraid your information is totally inaccurate!
As for Muslim Brotherhood they're in power in Tunisia and they're the majority in Parliament in Morrocco and were in Jordan for a long time and the whole world are dealing with them in those countries.
In Egypt they were in Parliament in Mubarak regime, and they weren't terrorists!
But maybe because you get your knowledge from documentaries and ignore news agencies you didn't knw that terrorism in Egypt didn't stop when Muslim Brotherhood won the only democratic election, so if they're the source of ISIS and other groups why would they practice terrorism against their regime?!!
But as you said you know what your media want you to now, so you're unable to get the truth unless form documentaries. You might like to check the Israeli press recent scandal that Israeli government funded and aided the islamist rebels in Syria! And they treated their casualties in Israel!
And you never heard that the war on Iraq was because a lie of weapons of mass destruction and the west brought terrorism to the region.
and it's too funny to talk about Sharia law and islamist regime where in all muslim countries just two of them apply Sharia law Saudi is one of them.
If you care that much about what is good for you you may convice your government if you can that they mind their own business and leave the other nations live as they like. That would be the shortest way to peace for everyone one. Not to support a fu*king killer as Trump calls him just because he's serving your interest.

comment_content.original_script:
@Vagabondo I have no idea about his Intelligence Quantity but he seems to be holding and progressing Egypt and, given the circumstances and the fact he is a military person, with a fair amount of democracy.

As for the muslim brotherhood, I just know what the whole world knows. I know that they are Islamo-fascists affiliated with ISIS or other terrorist muslim groups. I know that they tried to impose a theocratic regime and turn a secular country into a country governed by sharia. I know that they set up various groups like "Giza" as their military wing that carried various terrorist operations in places like Sinai, Libya and elsewhere including attacks against other religions like the Coptic church erc.

Don't get me wrong, an Islamist regime, sharia and all those things might be fine with you but they are not for me and, I believe, for the western state of being. As I said, everything is not for everybody.

There are numerous documentaries for the Islamic Brotherhood i.e. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kyG3fLt4heM

comment_content.original_script:
Let me just clarify some things, Al Sisi the current president overthrew the elected president with a coup d'eait backed with the army killing many inocent protesters in the process.
The county has seen no improvement at all during his reign inflation has only increased, many multi million projects have been state funded for the President himself and his family. Furthermore the army had taken a very dictator like rule over the economy with new projects only funded for army personell and affiliates leaving the Egyptian people poorer and with bigger completion.

So yes they're may not be hard evidence such as paper work showing corruption but it doesn't require a genius to connect the dots.

comment_content.original_script: @Nevan Masterson Not the BBC. The beeb is simply a mouthpice for the establishment. Not my words but that of journalists who know it well. Gaddafi in Libya was overthrown because he wanted to drop the US petrodollar to trade oil in the Gold Dinar. It's not a theory. It's true. Only if people are complete morons who do not research outside the MSM that they don't see or believe it. Big shock. The banking corporate establishment that owns 80 percent of the world's wealth also influences governments and intelligence agencies. They all do it. Not just the US but Russia and China too. Don't preach to me either. I am a veteran. I've been to Iraq. It's all about blood oil and murder in the Middle East. And whether a government is on board or not with the globalists.

Gaddafi in Libya was overthrown because he wanted to drop the US petrodollar to trade oil in the Gold Dinar. It's not a theory. It's true. The banking corporate establishment that owns 80 percent of the world's wealth also influences governments and intelligence agencies. They all do it. Not just the US but Russia and China too. Don't preach to me either. I am a veteran. I've been to Iraq. It's all about blood oil and murder in the Middle East. And whether a government is on board or not with the globalists.

@bittercottoncandy
He doesn't live in Egypt because he has no choice. Anyone writes a word against Sissi on social media gets arrested for years without persecution. Anyone wants to oppose Sissi has to get out of Egypt. And that person is so special because he revealed secrets from inside the army institutions where he used to take contracts and talked to the simple people about their miserable conditions while Sisi is wasting billions of international loans in bullshit and asks the Egyptians to starve in order to build the economy! He even asked the people to donate 1 Egyptian pound everyday while his wife is wasting millions on palaces renovations!
While all the opposition figures use special terms to talk about democracy and human rights and freedom of speech ...etc this guy talked to the simple people about their sufferings.
And he said he's ready to be persecuted for corruption if justice is guaranteed but in Egypt the judicial system is corrupted.
